description: Generate user stories from simple ideas

parentId.description: Optional parent story ID for child stories

example.idea: I want to add a search feature

success.description: Whether the story was successfully posted to frontend

prompt.template:
Create a user story for: {{idea}}

{{parentContext}}After generating the story, POST it directly to the frontend using this command:

curl -X POST {{frontendUrl}}/api/story-created \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"storyId":"[generated-id]","title":"[title]","description":"[description]","asA":"[role]","iWant":"[goal]","soThat":"[benefit]","components":["[components]"],"storyPoint":[points],"enhanced":true,"enhancedAt":"[timestamp]","source":"kiro-direct"}'

Then return this confirmation JSON:
{"success":true,"action":"posted-to-frontend","storyId":"[same-id]","timestamp":"[timestamp]"}
instructions: Generate a complete user story with all required fields
Execute the curl command to POST directly to frontend
Use the same storyId in both the POST and confirmation response
Replace ALL placeholder values with actual generated content
Return only the confirmation JSON after posting
